comment: there should be a negative sign on your answer because we want to plug in q rxn not q solution. We know qrxn=-qsolution, so we would plug in -640 J as opposed to 640J. This will give us a negative delta H value which will correspond to the fact that this is an exothermic rxn. Thank you!
